revised_title: Twistor Theory and Einstein Equations: Googly Maps and Asymptotic Twistors
tldr: This article explores the relationship between twistor theory and the Einstein equations, focusing on the concept of googly maps and their role in understanding asymptotically flat space-times. The author discusses the structure of Penrose systems and the properties of asymptotic twistors, providing a deeper understanding of the connection between twistor theory and general relativity.
